subject: Attention Customer.
body:
Attention Customer.
In respect of your fund inheritance payment $15.7 million US Dollars, we the bank authorities US Bank of Chicago IL, head office will send you a new ATM VISA CARD that will accumulate your total funds of $15.7 million USD according to the instruction from our creditor department here in the bank today. After the board of directors meeting held on the March  / 08/ 2024 the total payment was approved for payment to you in new ATM VISA CARD which you must use to make withdraw of your fund in any ATM slotting machine around the world with maximum amount of $25,000 USD in daily payment until you cash the total payment of $15.7 Million USD credited in your ATM account.
Meanwhile, you have to send the required fee of $20 USD request for obtain the Affidavit of claim Ownership
 in your transaction with government of your fund origin been Federal Justice US, the US Monitory Fund Investigation Union head office in Washington DC capital United State of America will declare your payment free from any money laundry and terrorism drug money sponsor activities to enable our service have the authority of release the payment to you and register it with US MAILING POST for over-night delivery to your address without delay.
The bank has also directed that the payment should be sent
try your human possible best and buy the iTuns gift card or steam wallet  card, or Razer Gold card  send $20 iTunes card
Steam Wallet card and scratch it very well and snap it picture send to
me because that is the best way without cost you any transfer fee ,
so we can direct it to the right office imposition to release the document. And immediately you make the payment to them the document will sign and your ATM parcel will deliver to your address without delay.
Yours in service.
CEO WELLS FARGO BANK

subject: Re: Attention Customer.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your email. It's quite exciting to hear about the ATM VISA CARD and the potential of receiving such a large sum of money. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these types of transactions.

Could you please explain more about how this process works? For instance, what is the Affidavit of claim Ownership and why is it necessary? Also, could you clarify why there's a need for a gift card or steam wallet card?

I'm sorry for all the questions. I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly before proceeding.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Keneth
